org.apache.hadoop.record
接口 RecordInput

所有已知实现类：
BinaryRecordInput, CsvRecordInput, XmlRecordInput
已过时。 Replaced by Avro. 

@Deprecated
@InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public interface RecordInput

Interface that all the Deserializers have to implement.

方法摘要
 void endMap(String tag)
          已过时。 Check the mark for end of the serialized map.
 void endRecord(String tag)
          已过时。 Check the mark for end of the serialized record.
 void endVector(String tag)
          已过时。 Check the mark for end of the serialized vector.
 boolean readBool(String tag)
          已过时。 Read a boolean from serialized record.

          已过时。 Read byte array from serialized record.

          已过时。 Read a byte from serialized record.
 double readDouble(String tag)
          已过时。 Read a double-precision number from serialized record.

          已过时。 Read a single-precision float from serialized record.
